Arboviral Disease [Other] (Tests for Arbovirus [Other] Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    23553-1 Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus subtype [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    49114-2 Flavivirus rRNA [Units/volume] (viral load) in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    51665-8 Flavivirus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    51666-6 Japanese encephalitis virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    7936-8 Japanese encephalitis virus RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
